column2:
"Hm, what if this isn't enough...
This is an important event, so I can't help worrying."
"Huh...? I could add music to help people feel more relaxed?"
"That's true, if you listen to soothing music that uses the right kinds of sounds, it can help to heal you!"
"Then it's decided! But I'll need your help! Could you gather materials from defeated enemies that'll create the sounds we need?"
